items.sentence: Tom was very embarrassed when his children didn't behave themselves in the park.
Tom is one of those managers who call you to tell you they've sent you an email.
I was given a nasty look when I asked for my prescription at the local doctor's.
It's easier to fool people than it is to convince them that they've been fooled.
Everything we can imagine is real, but what is really real is the real question.
